title: ISic000626. I.Sicily inscription 000626
body:
1⸙ Pompeianis · vita ⸙
2Ob insignem iustitiam
3et merita litterarum et amorem
4quem non solum circa patriam
5sed per omnem provincia͡m conlocavit
6Iul(io) · Cl(audio) · Peristerio vac.
7Pompeiano v(iro) · c(larissimo) ex cons(ulari) · p(rovinciae) · S(iciliae) ·
8universa curia in coetu <splendido> · suo
9patrono digno et prestantissimo
10statuam conlocavit
vac.
11⸙ Amazoniis vita ⸙

l.8 splendido | l.9 reg., orig. prestantissimo

1POMPEIANISVITA
2OBINSIGNEMIUSTITIAM
3ETMERITALITTERARUMETAMOREM
4QUEMNONSOLUMCIRCAPATRIAM
5SEDPEROMNEMPROVINCIA͡MCONLOCAVIT
6IULCLPERISTERIO      
7POMPEIANOVCEXCONSPS
8UNIVERSACURIAINCOETUSPLENDIDUSUO
9PATRONODIGNOETPRESTANTISSIMO
10STATUAMCONLOCAVIT
      vacat
11AMAZONIISVITA

l.8 splendido | l.9 reg., orig. prestantissimo

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text based upon photograph in Wilson

translation

Life to the (family of the) Pompeiani! On account of his distinguished justice, and of his literary merits, and of the love which he placed not only on his fatherland but on the whole province; to Iulius Claudius Peristerius Pompeianus, of clarissimus rank, former governor (consularis) of the province of Sicily; the whole council (curia), in a splendid meeting, set up this statue to its worthy and most excellent patron. Life to the (family of the) Amazonii! [translation from LSA 2853]

commentary

This inscription is on the reverse of the block employed for ISic000627, a prior, late C2 CE, honorific text.

bibliography

  • 1906.0075.ii https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • Wilson 1990 180 fig.152 with n.114-115 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001509
  • 8911 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000352
  • Salinas NSA 1905 216-218 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001392
  • Oliveri 2009 390-391 no.3B ph https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001723
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence
